operation.expression: fn:concat('"','Ongoing MDM to CFIN ','' , '"', ',','"','dt_PDT_01_getParameter_MDM_to_CFIN','"',',','"','Extract the information from MDM to CFIN - dt_getParameters','"',',','"',fn:replace(fn:replace(fn:replace($temp.dt_PDT_01_getParameter_MDM_to_CFIN[1]/fault[1]/code,'[<>]',""),'(\r?\n|\r)',""),'(\[|\]|\\|\||\-|\^|\$|\?|\*|\+|\{|\}|\(|\)|")'," "),'"',',','"',$temp.vErrorDetail ,'"',',','"',fn:replace($temp.vErrorReason ,"\\\\","\\") ,'"',',','"','Ongoing MDM to CFIN','"')

fn:concat('"','Ongoing MDM to CFIN ','' , '"', ',','"','dt_PDT_01_Extract_MDM_to_CFIN','"',',','"','Extract the information from MDM to CFIN - dt_PDT_01_Extract_MDM_to_CFIN','"',',','"',fn:replace(fn:replace(fn:replace($temp.dt_PDT_01_Extract_MDM_to_CFIN[1]/fault[1]/code,'[<>]',""),'(\r?\n|\r)',""),'(\[|\]|\\|\||\-|\^|\$|\?|\*|\+|\{|\}|\(|\)|")'," "),'"',',','"',$temp.vErrorDetail ,'"',',','"',fn:replace($temp.vErrorReason ,"\\\\","\\") ,'"',',','"','Ongoing MDM to CFIN','"')
